channel.title: Need help on propper ip bans!
channel.description:
You see i've been trying to get ip banns now for 3 weeks!... this is wat i've been told....
#1. Go to characters, click their name, copy their last connection:... and paste it into BannedIps. That doesn't work, because people can get on different accounts, E.G I ip ban someone thats advertising. they just come on a different account and keep on spamming.
#2. I've also been told to, type ::checkip, or ::ipcheck, or somet like that, and that didn't work because it's exactly the same as last connection.
So that didn't work -.-!
#3. i have read the tut, followed that.... GUESS WOT! it didn't work...
SO PLEASE... SOMEONE TELL ME HOW TO IP BAN PROPERLY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad:

item.title: Need help on propper ip bans!
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

You see i’ve been trying to get ip banns now for 3 weeks!.. this is wat i’ve been told…

#1. Go to characters, click their name, copy their last connection:… and paste it into BannedIps.
That doesn’t work, because people can get on different accounts, E.G
I ip ban someone thats advertising. they just come on a different account and keep on spamming.

#2. I’ve also been told to, type ::checkip, or ::ipcheck, or somet like that, and that didn’t work because it’s exactly the same as last connection.

So that didn’t work -.-!

#3. i have read the tut, followed that… GUESS WOT! it didn’t work…

SO PLEASE… SOMEONE TELL ME HOW TO IP BAN PROPERLY!!! :mad: :mad: :mad:
